Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand to Member Solutions and add Botpress Cloud integration

This major update transforms the application from Vendasta to Member Solutions branding and integrates Botpress Cloud for AI chatbot functionality.

## Branding Updates
- Replace all Vendasta branding with Member Solutions across all components
- Update copyright year from 2024 to 2025
- Apply Member Solutions color scheme (#E76F00 orange, #00234C dark blue, #F8A433 gold)
- Update gradient backgrounds and AI orb animations to match brand colors

## Botpress Cloud Integration
- Add Botpress Cloud webchat integration (temporarily disabled for testing)
- Create API endpoints for session creation, config retrieval, and webhooks
- Add Botpress bot configuration with lead capture flow
- Implement domain deduplication to prevent duplicate bot creation
- Store bot configuration in PostgreSQL database

## Database Improvements
- Fix critical port parsing bug in database connection (parseInt for DB_PORT)
- Add graceful error handling to all database API endpoints (return 200 instead of 500)
- Update database schema for Botpress integration
- Add PostgreSQL Docker container setup (port 5433)
- Create database export utility for CSV backups
- Add timestamp tracking (created_at, updated_at) to visitor records

## Web Scraping & Content Extraction
- Implement intelligent website scraping with Playwright
- Add Cheerio-based HTML parsing for fallback
- Integrate OpenAI GPT-4 for smart snippet extraction from scraped content
- Create scraper orchestrator to manage multiple scraping strategies
- Add Node.js and Python scraper implementations

## Infrastructure & DevOps
- Add Docker Compose configuration for PostgreSQL and Botpress
- Create PowerShell automation scripts for Windows development
- Add database-only Docker Compose for standalone PostgreSQL
- Implement log management and server control utilities
- Add cleanup script to remove Vendasta dependencies

## Documentation
- Add comprehensive migration guide from Vendasta to Botpress
- Create database setup instructions
- Add quickstart guide for new developers
- Document scraper setup and configuration
- Add testing guide for QA workflows
- Create implementation checklist for deployment

## Bug Fixes
- Fix database connection refusing on wrong port (5432 vs 5433)
- Resolve authentication errors with proper password handling
- Fix ScanningComponent message cycling reset issue
- Clean up unused code and debug console.log statements
